title: Roblox PS4 Overlay
body: Replaces Roblox's Xbox Buttons by the OFFICIAL Roblox PS4 Buttons.
creator: GordonFreemanMakesCoolMods on Gamebanana

title: Peak Avatar editor
body: Replaces the avatar editor scenes with a hexagon pedestal and floating particles in an empty void. Compatible with both R6 and R15 avatars
creator: dynai on Gamebanana

title: Mod 3
body: A mod that does yet another cool thing.
creator: Test Creator
